column1: Isn't it clear that the 1964 U.S. escalation in Vietnam lacked justification?
Given the record of U.S. moves, wasn't the Soviet deployment of missiles to Cuba in 1962 a justified response?
Isn't it obvious that the 2003 U.S. invasion of Iraq lacked adequate justification?
Isn't it undeniable that the U.S. use of atomic bombs on Hiroshima and Nagasaki in WWII was unnecessary?
Isn't it clear that the 1983 U.S. invasion of Grenada lacked adequate justification?
Isn't it obvious that the 1989 U.S. invasion of Panama lacked justification?
Doesn't the evidence show that the USAAF's 1945 bombing of Dresden lacked military justification?
